author: MuhammadArham-43
body:
#### PR description:
CLUE-2D inputs for CLUE3D ported to heterogeneous hardware using ALPAKA framework. Detailed report available on: https://cds.cern.ch/record/2911079/files/CERNProjectReport___CMSSW.pdf

#### PR validation:
Ran Step 1 until Step 3 on the matrix and verified results, comparing to the original implementation. Get exact results for simulated data.
title: ALPAKA CLUE2D Code Heterogenous Code Porting
